en-US.name: Illinois Radio Reader
en-US.summary: A free radio service for the blind and visually impaired community of east central Illinois, provided by Illinois Public Media.
en-US.description:
The Illinois Radio Reader is a free service for the reading impaired community of east central Illinois. The service depends on volunteer readers who produce 80+ hours of weekly programming.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Illinois Radio Reader" or "Alexa, play Illinois Radio Reader" to start the radio".

You can stop the radio at any time by saying "Alexa, stop".

See the full reader schedule at https://will.illinois.edu/illinoisradioreader/schedule.
en-US.updatesDescription:
1.0.1:

	- Play copyright notification on startup.

	- Add schedule URL to description.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
1. Say 'Alexa, play illinois radio reader.'

Tester should hear central illinois news content.

2. Say 'stop.'

Audio should stop.
